i18n.title: View Differences in Changes
i18n.description: In this lab, you will learn how to use the `git diff` command to view the differences between your local changes and the last commit in a Git repository.

meta.title: Mastering Git Diffs
meta.description: Explore the power of Git's difference tracking feature to streamline your development workflow.
meta.keywords: version control, code changes, git labs, comparison, git, diff, git playground

verify.name: Verify for successful view
verify.hint: Please make sure you have completed the required actions.

i18n.title: 查看更改差异
i18n.description: 在本实验中，你将学习如何使用 `git diff` 命令来查看本地更改与Git仓库中上次提交之间的差异。

meta.title: 掌握Git差异对比
meta.description: 探索Git差异跟踪功能的强大之处，以简化你的开发工作流程。
meta.keywords: 版本控制, 代码更改, Git实验, 对比, Git, 差异, Git游乐场

verify.name: 验证是否成功查看
verify.hint: 请确保你已完成所需操作。
